source:
import pandas as pd

# Read in the data
df=pd.read_csv('../2023_nos_scraper.csv')
df
#use .apply to apply the function to every cell in the 'text' column

#define stopwords from stopwords_nl.txt
with open("stopwords-nl.txt", "r") as f:
    stopwords_nl = f.read().splitlines()

stopwords_nl

%%time

from bertopic import BERTopic
from sklearn.feature_extraction.text import CountVectorizer
from sentence_transformers import SentenceTransformer
from umap import UMAP

#this model uses a sentence transformer model to embed the documents

sentence_model = SentenceTransformer("paraphrase-multilingual-MiniLM-L12-v2")

umap_model = UMAP(n_neighbors=15, n_components=5, 
                  min_dist=0.0, metric='cosine', random_state=42)


nl_model = BERTopic(embedding_model=sentence_model, umap_model=umap_model)
nl_model.fit(doc_list)

%%time

# This model uses a CountVectorizer to embed the documents
# calculate_probabilities=False to speed up the process
# min_topic_size= can be decreased (e.g. to 6) for smaller datasets. By default it is 10. 


vectorizer_model = CountVectorizer(stop_words=stopwords_nl)
cv_model = BERTopic(vectorizer_model=vectorizer_model, min_topic_size=6, calculate_probabilities=False, nr_topics=50)

cv_topics, cv_probs = cv_model.fit_transform(doc_list)
